mapper.select: select user_idx from trash_history where date = curdate() group by user_idx;

select trash_history_idx as trashHistoryIdx , user_idx as userIdx , trash_idx as trashIdx , trash_weight as trashWeight , date as date
from trash_history
where date = curdate()
select payment_idx as paymentIdx , total_price as totalPrice , status as status , date as date from payment where user_idx = #{userIdx}
select payment_detail_idx as paymentDetailIdx , payment_idx as paymentIdx , trash_idx as trashIdx , trash_weight as trashWeight , price as price from payment_detail where payment_idx = #{paymentIdx};
